title: Michelle's Extra Digit
description: Ken was a small-town, Southern boy all alone in the big city until he met the girl of his dreams one night at the supermarket. She seemed like the perfect girl, but there's more to Michelle than meets the eye.Now Ken finds himself taking part in an erotic night's journey that both frightens and excites him at the same time. Part of him wants to kiss every inch of this beautiful creature who seems more than willing to make all his dreams come true, but how far is he willing to go and what all do those dreams entail?Warning - this novel depicts multiple acts of sexual intercourse involving a transgendered person.
author: Calloway North
